articles.title: ICC Women's Player of the Month nominees for February 2024 revealed - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Three top performers from February 2024 have been shortlisted for the ICC Women’s Player of the Month award.
articles.content:
Kavisha Egodage (UAE)
218 runs and eight wickets in six matches

articles.author: Sumit Gupta
articles.title: Potential Replacements For Devon Conway In CSK For IPL 2024 - OneCricket
articles.description: CSK have hit a major bump as their star player, Devon Conway, will miss the initial part of the IPL 2024. Conway needs surgery on his left thumb, which means he won't be playing for at least eight weeks.
articles.content:
Conway's thumb surgery sidelines him for 8 weeks [x.com]
